name: UNIX Operator
tagline: A menu-based control system for UNIX-like systems.
body:
UNIX-Operator
=============

UNIX Operator is a menu-based control system for UNIX-like systems.

UNIX Operator is maintained by a group of people, including Alex Martin(@alexbuzzbee), who oversees the project.

GPL NOTICE
----------

UNIX Operator version 0.15-dev, simple menu-based interface for UNIX systems.
